text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with huckleberry Jam in hi-def i
got a new camera a new canon rebel
camera so my photos will be slightly
less mediocre and then i realized it has
high def video capabilities which i'm
thinking blow my crappy old camcorder
away so see there i actually figured out
you have to focus it by the way this is
michelle holding it while I'm cooking so
this is a very rough test so bear with
us but we're making huckleberry jam in
hi-def so I had almost three cups of
huckleberries so you want when you make
jam equal amounts of sugar for
huckleberries at least some berries
depending on the sweetness might be
different then I'm going to take one box
of powdered pectin usually a box is for
a quarter fruit and I had three cups so
I'm only gonna use 3/4 of it alright I'm
gonna add the pectin to the saucepan
with a little bit of water just to
dissolve it I'm gonna put that over
medium heat whisk it around and when
that was dissolved which I took a minute
I'm gonna add my sugar and fruit and I'm
gonna cook that over medium heat until
it starts to boil now I kind of want the
huckleberries to pretty much be whole
but I do want to break up a few of them
so as this was melting I just kind of
smooshed it with the spatula so that
some of them were breaking up I mean you
can do whatever you want you can leave
ma whole you could puree them all you
are the boss of your jam so you decide
so these shots here again just testing
the HD camera I think it looks fantastic
I'm not sure how it's going to look
after its rendered on YouTube but we'll
see
so some of these shots I hit really had
no reason to keep the camera on but it
just looks so pretty
so once it comes to a boil i'ma add
juice of half a lemon and then I'm going
to turn it off
stir that in and the jam is done except
for the cooling god I'm really liking
how this looks
who'd have thought a regular digital
camera has better video than my video
camera unbelievable alright so what
you're going to do is after you turn it
off you're gonna transfer that into
either prepared jam jars you know how to
do that right those little pint jars but
I'm just gonna put this all in one
container for now to cool it and as it
cools just to give it a stir every once
in a while alright so anyway that was a
high def test I tested my high def and
you saw how to make huckleberry Jam
anyway I hope you give that a try
check out the site for the ingredients
and as always enjoy in hi-def
